tool_description: Scans existing directory structures to inventory contents, analyze hierarchy patterns, and generate comprehensive directory listings with metadata.

scan_root.description: Root directory path to begin scanning from

scan_depth.description: Maximum depth to scan (1-20, where 1 is immediate children only)

include_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden directories in scan results

filter_pattern.description: Glob pattern to filter directory names (e.g., test*, *tmp)

collect_metadata.description: Whether to collect directory metadata during scan

sort_order.description: Sort order for results: name, date, size, depth

error_messages: Access denied: Insufficient permissions to scan the specified root directory.
Directory not found: The specified scan_root directory does not exist.
Invalid scan depth: scan_depth must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid sort order: Use one of [name, date, size, depth] for sort_order.
Invalid filter pattern: The provided glob pattern is malformed.
usage: Provide scan_root directory path, optionally configure scan_depth, include_hidden, filter_pattern, collect_metadata, and sort_order. The tool returns comprehensive directory inventory.

scanned_directories.description: List of all directories found during the scan

scan_summary.description: Summary of scan results and statistics

scan_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the scan was completed
